parameters.name: EnableTagAuthorization
parameters.description: Specifies whether tag authorization is enabled.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The instance ID. If you do not specify this parameter, all instances are returned.

parameters.name: Language
parameters.description:
The language in which you want the description of the system policy to be returned. Valid values:

*   en: English
*   zh: Chinese
*   ja: Japanese

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description: The tag that is bound to the instance.
